General.Name: Canadian Medical Center Co
General.Description: Canadian General Medical Center Complex Company engages in the management of hospitals and health centers in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia. Its services include pediatric clinic, internal medicine, eye clinic, ear, nose and throat clinic, general medicine, emergency department, radiology department, and laboratory, as well as provides medical services to oil and gas well drilling companies. The company also trades in hospital tools and equipment, and ambulances. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Dammam, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia.
General.Address: Omar bin al Khattab Street, Dammam, Saudi Arabia

0.Name: Mr. Waddah Mohammed Farhan Al-Ammar Al-Dosari
